title: MiniMetis NFT Home
intro: Join MiniMe as she explores the future of Ethereum scaling, gas fee reduction, and the Layer 2 wars!
story:
This NFT collection is like no other. MiniMe has arrived on Ethereum's Layer1 in search of a solution to Vitalik's “End Game” vision where he spoke to Ethereum's Rollup Centric Roadmap.

Does the future belong to a single Layer2 rollup infrastructure? Will they need to play nice and be interoperable? Will they go to war with eachother, competing aggressively to develop infrastructure that results in the cheapest gas fees?

Join MiniMe on her quest. Layer2 utility awaites...
